title: Panda-Z: The Robonimation
synopsis: Panda-Z chronicles the misadventures of Pan Taron and his giant robot Panda-Z, as they battle the evil Skull Panda and his Warunimal forces.
staff: [['Satou, Takuya', ['Co-Director']], ['Kanbe, Mamoru', ['Director']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['JAM Project', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
